title: Tim Cahill flies into London to discuss Millwall return
description: Tim Cahill is flying to London to discuss terms with Millwall over a potential move back to the club, according to Sky sources.
content: Cahill, 38, is set to hold talks with the Championship side over the weekend and hopes to make a return to English football.The Australia international left Melbourne City in December 2017 but remains focused on playing at the 2018 World Cup.The former Everton midfielder believes he needs regular game time after helping Australia qualify for this summer's tournament in Russia.Cahill began his professional career in England with Milwall in 1998 and played a key role in the Championship side's surprise run to the FA Cup final in 2004, where they lost to Manchester United.He also won the League One title and played in two play-off finals in his six-year spell at the south London club.
